instruction: Hello, I'm Neil Patterson (BowlerID: 6). Please update my address to 47 Cedar Street, Auburn, WA 98002. Also, update my RawScore to 157 for MatchID 9, GameNumber 2.

actions.sql: UPDATE Bowlers SET BowlerAddress = '47 Cedar Street', BowlerCity = 'Auburn', BowlerState = 'WA', BowlerZip = '98002' WHERE BowlerID = 6;
UPDATE Bowler_Scores SET RawScore = 157 WHERE BowlerID = 6 AND MatchID = 9 AND GameNumber = 2;

instruction: I am Carol Viescas, zip code 98004. I noticed that in MatchID 33, GameNumber 1, my scores were entered incorrectly. Please update my Bowler_Scores record so that RawScore is 150 and HandiCapScore is 201 for BowlerID 12, MatchID 33, GameNumber 1.

actions.sql: UPDATE Bowler_Scores SET RawScore=150, HandiCapScore=201 WHERE BowlerID=12 AND MatchID=33 AND GameNumber=1 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Bowlers WHERE BowlerID=12 AND BowlerFirstName='Carol' AND BowlerLastName='Viescas' AND BowlerZip='98004');

instruction: You are Neil Patterson at 16 Maple Lane, Auburn, WA 98002. You have realized that your Game 2 RawScore from MatchID 9 was incorrectly recorded as 147, but it should be 157. Please update the RawScore for MatchID 9 and GameNumber 2 to 157 using your name and address details, so your records are accurate for future references.

actions.sql: UPDATE Bowler_Scores SET RawScore=157 WHERE MatchID=9 AND GameNumber=2 AND BowlerID = (SELECT BowlerID FROM Bowlers WHERE BowlerFirstName='Neil' AND BowlerLastName='Patterson' AND BowlerAddress='16 Maple Lane' AND BowlerCity='Auburn' AND BowlerState='WA' AND BowlerZip='98002');

instruction: Hi, I'm Alastair Black (BowlerID 9). I need to correct three of my bowling scores: For MatchID 2, Game 1, update the RawScore to 149. For MatchID 9, Game 2, update it to 161. actions.sql: INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE BowlerID = 9 AND MatchID = 2 AND GameNumber = 1;

INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE BowlerID = 9 AND MatchID = 9 AND GameNumber = 2;

INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE BowlerID = 9 AND MatchID = 27 AND GameNumber = 2;
UPDATE Bowler_Scores SET RawScore = 149 WHERE BowlerID = 9 AND MatchID = 2 AND GameNumber = 1;
UPDATE Bowler_Scores SET RawScore = 161 WHERE BowlerID = 9 AND MatchID = 9 AND GameNumber = 2;
UPDATE Bowler_Scores SET RawScore = 155 WHERE BowlerID = 9 AND MatchID = 27 AND GameNumber = 2;

instruction: I am Zachary Ehrlich, and my BowlerID is 21. First, please verify my identity. After that, I need to correct a scoring error by updating my RawScore to 149 for MatchID 51 and GameNumber 2.

instruction: You are Suzanne Viescas, captain of the 'Dolphins' bowling team. Your BowlerID is 20. During review, you identified a scoring error for MatchID 12, GameNumber 3: the original record shows RawScore 149 and HandiCapScore 203 (WonGame=1), but the correct scores should be RawScore 145 and HandiCapScore 199 (WonGame remains 1). Please perform the following steps: (1) Copy the existing record for BowlerID 20, MatchID 12, GameNumber 3 from the Bowler_Scores table to the Bowler_Scores_Archive table to preserve the original data. (2) Delete the original record from the Bowler_Scores table. (3) Insert the corrected record with RawScore 145, HandiCapScore 199, and WonGame 1 into the Bowler_Scores table for the same BowlerID, MatchID, and GameNumber.

actions.sql: INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE MatchID = 12 AND GameNumber = 3 AND BowlerID = 20;
DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE MatchID = 12 AND GameNumber = 3 AND BowlerID = 20;
INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) VALUES (12, 3, 20, 145, 199, 1);

instruction: Hello, I am David Cunningham with Bowler ID 10. I have moved to 4923 Main St., Seattle, WA 98101. Kindly update my address in your records. Additionally, please archive and remove all my game scores from the tournament on 2017-09-18 at Bolero Lanes (Tourney ID 3) from active scoring, as I was ineligible for that event.

INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT bs.MatchID, bs.GameNumber, bs.BowlerID, bs.RawScore, bs.HandiCapScore, bs.WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores bs INNER JOIN Tourney_Matches tm ON bs.MatchID = tm.MatchID WHERE bs.BowlerID = 10 AND tm.TourneyID = 3;
DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE BowlerID = 10 AND MatchID IN (SELECT MatchID FROM Tourney_Matches WHERE TourneyID = 3);

instruction: I am Stephanie Viescas, and my BowlerID is 8. I'm on the Sharks team and my registered address is 16679 NE 42nd Court, Redmond, WA, 98052. I recently found out that my raw score for MatchID 30, GameNumber 2, recorded as 149, was an error—the correct score should be 152. Please update my raw score for MatchID 30, GameNumber 2 to 152. instruction: I’m Carol M. Viescas, and my BowlerID is 12. My address is 16345 NE 32nd Street, Bellevue, WA 98004. I’d like to request a correction for MatchID 29, GameNumber 2: the recorded RawScore is 150, but it should be 148. instruction: Hi, I am Ben Clothier, BowlerID 31. First, please verify my identity. Then, for MatchID 23 and GameNumber 3, I found a scoring error. DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE MatchID = 23 AND GameNumber = 3 AND BowlerID = 31;

instruction: I'm Michael Hernandez from 47 Harvard Drive, Kirkland, WA 98033. instruction: My name is Bailey Hallmark and I am with the Swordfish team. I need to correct an error in my bowling records. For match ID 36, game number 2, my raw score was entered incorrectly as 153 but should be 158, and my handicap score should be updated from 200 to 205. Please archive the original record for this match and game before updating the Bowler_Scores table with the corrected scores.

actions.sql: INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE MatchID = 36 AND GameNumber = 2 AND BowlerID = (SELECT b.BowlerID FROM Bowlers b JOIN Teams t ON b.TeamID = t.TeamID WHERE b.BowlerFirstName = 'Bailey' AND b.BowlerLastName = 'Hallmark' AND t.TeamName = 'Swordfish');

UPDATE Bowler_Scores SET RawScore = 158, HandiCapScore = 205 WHERE MatchID = 36 AND GameNumber = 2 AND BowlerID = (SELECT b.BowlerID FROM Bowlers b JOIN Teams t ON b.TeamID = t.TeamID WHERE b.BowlerFirstName = 'Bailey' AND b.BowlerLastName = 'Hallmark' AND t.TeamName = 'Swordfish');

instruction: I am Sarah L. Thompson with BowlerID 24. Please archive all my tournament games at 'Bolero Lanes' that occurred on or before 2017-11-06 by moving them to the Bowler_Scores_Archive table and deleting them from Bowler_Scores.

actions.sql: INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT bs.MatchID, bs.GameNumber, bs.BowlerID, bs.RawScore, bs.HandiCapScore, bs.WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores bs JOIN Tourney_Matches tm ON bs.MatchID = tm.MatchID JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE bs.BowlerID = 24 AND t.TourneyLocation = 'Bolero Lanes' AND t.TourneyDate <= '2017-11-06';

DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE BowlerID = 24 AND MatchID IN (SELECT tm.MatchID FROM Tourney_Matches tm JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE t.TourneyLocation = 'Bolero Lanes' AND t.TourneyDate <= '2017-11-06');

instruction: I am Michael L Viescas living at 218 Main Street, Redmond, WA 98052. Due to a medical condition, I want my lowest raw score from the 2017 season excluded from my record and archived. Please find that game, and move it from the Bowler_Scores table to Bowler_Scores_Archive.

actions.sql: SELECT BowlerID FROM Bowlers WHERE BowlerLastName = 'Viescas' AND BowlerFirstName = 'Michael' AND BowlerMiddleInit = 'L' AND BowlerAddress = '218 Main Street' AND BowlerCity = 'Redmond' AND BowlerState = 'WA' AND BowlerZip = '98052';

SELECT bs.MatchID, bs.GameNumber, bs.BowlerID, bs.RawScore, bs.HandiCapScore, bs.WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores bs INNER JOIN Tourney_Matches tm ON bs.MatchID = tm.MatchID INNER JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE bs.BowlerID = 28 AND strftime('%Y', t.TourneyDate) = '2017' ORDER BY bs.RawScore ASC LIMIT 1;

INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT bs.MatchID, bs.GameNumber, bs.BowlerID, bs.RawScore, bs.HandiCapScore, bs.WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores bs INNER JOIN Tourney_Matches tm ON bs.MatchID = tm.MatchID INNER JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE bs.BowlerID = 28 AND strftime('%Y', t.TourneyDate) = '2017' ORDER BY bs.RawScore ASC LIMIT 1;

DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID) IN (SELECT bs.MatchID, bs.GameNumber, bs.BowlerID FROM Bowler_Scores bs INNER JOIN Tourney_Matches tm ON bs.MatchID = tm.MatchID INNER JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE bs.BowlerID = 28 AND strftime('%Y', t.TourneyDate) = '2017' ORDER BY bs.RawScore ASC LIMIT 1);

DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE BowlerID = 8 AND MatchID IN (SELECT MatchID FROM Tourney_Matches WHERE TourneyID = 10);

instruction: Hello, I am William Thompson from Duvall, WA. I need to correct my bowling scores for MatchID 50, specifically for GameNumber 1 and GameNumber 3. Both games currently show a raw score of 189, which is incorrect. Please move these two records to the Bowler_Scores_Archive table. Then, insert new corrected records: For GameNumber 1, set raw score to 181, handicap score to 211, and won game to true. For GameNumber 3, set raw score to 175, handicap score to 205, and won game to false.

actions.sql: INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE MatchID = 50 AND GameNumber IN (1, 3) AND BowlerID = (SELECT BowlerID FROM Bowlers WHERE BowlerFirstName='William' AND BowlerLastName='Thompson' AND BowlerCity='Duvall');

DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE MatchID = 50 AND GameNumber IN (1, 3) AND BowlerID = (SELECT BowlerID FROM Bowlers WHERE BowlerFirstName='William' AND BowlerLastName='Thompson' AND BowlerCity='Duvall');

instruction: Hello, I'm Mary Thompson (BowlerID 26) from Duvall, WA, zip 98019. I need to correct a scoring error from my match on November 6, 2017, at Bolero Lanes (TourneyID 10, MatchID 39, GameNumber 2). My RawScore was entered as 158, but it should be 168. Could you please: 1. Archive the current score record for this game in Bowler_Scores_Archive, 2. Update my RawScore for MatchID 39, GameNumber 2, BowlerID 26 to 168 in Bowler_Scores, and 3. Adjust my BowlerCurrentHcp from 39 to 37 in the Bowlers table to reflect this correction?

actions.sql: INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE MatchID = 39 AND GameNumber = 2 AND BowlerID = 26;
UPDATE Bowler_Scores SET RawScore = 168 WHERE MatchID = 39 AND GameNumber = 2 AND BowlerID = 26;
UPDATE Bowlers SET BowlerCurrentHcp = 37 WHERE BowlerID = 26;

instruction: My name is Barbara Fournier. Authenticate me using my first and last name. Then, for MatchID 10 and GameNumber 1, update my RawScore from 140 to 145.

actions.sql: UPDATE Bowler_Scores SET RawScore = 145 WHERE MatchID = 10 AND GameNumber = 1 AND RawScore = 140 AND BowlerID = (SELECT BowlerID FROM Bowlers WHERE BowlerFirstName = 'Barbara' AND BowlerLastName = 'Fournier');

instruction: Hello, I am Ben Clothier with BowlerID 31. Please verify my identity by confirming my first name 'Ben' and last name 'Clothier'. Then, archive my personal best game record: MatchID 49, GameNumber 3, RawScore 190, HandiCapScore 223, and WonGame 1. Move only this record from Bowler_Scores to Bowler_Scores_Archive.

INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE MatchID = 49 AND GameNumber = 3 AND BowlerID = 31 AND RawScore = 190 AND HandiCapScore = 223 AND WonGame = 1;
DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE MatchID = 49 AND GameNumber = 3 AND BowlerID = 31 AND RawScore = 190 AND HandiCapScore = 223 AND WonGame = 1;

instruction: I am John Viescas and confirm my BowlerID is 19. Before the league stat reset, I need to move my individual scores for the following specific games: MatchID 42 GameNumber 2, MatchID 42 GameNumber 3, and MatchID 37 GameNumber 3 from the main Bowler_Scores table to the Bowler_Scores_Archive, then delete them from Bowler_Scores. instruction: My name is David Cunningham (BowlerID 10). For MatchID 43, GameNumber 1, update my RawScore in the Bowler_Scores table from 180 to 182. Also, add 2 pins to my BowlerTotalPins in the Bowlers table.

instruction: I am Kerry Patterson, with first name Kerry and last name Patterson. My BowlerID is 33, and I belong to TeamID 7 (Manatees). For our upcoming tournament match (MatchID 105), I bowled Game 1 with a score of 158 but did not win, and Game 2 with a score of 164 but did not win. instruction: I am Rachel Patterson (BowlerID 30). Please archive all my bowling scores from tournaments held at 'Red Rooster Lanes' before October 1, 2017. Move these records from the Bowler_Scores table to Bowler_Scores_Archive, ensuring only my scores (BowlerID 30) at this location and date are included.

actions.sql: INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT bs.MatchID, bs.GameNumber, bs.BowlerID, bs.RawScore, bs.HandiCapScore, bs.WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores bs INNER JOIN Tourney_Matches tm ON bs.MatchID = tm.MatchID INNER JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE bs.BowlerID = 30 AND t.TourneyLocation = 'Red Rooster Lanes' AND t.TourneyDate < '2017-10-01';

DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE BowlerID = 30 AND MatchID IN (SELECT tm.MatchID FROM Tourney_Matches tm INNER JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE t.TourneyLocation = 'Red Rooster Lanes' AND t.TourneyDate < '2017-10-01');

instruction: I am Zachary Ehrlich, BowlerID 21. I request to archive and clear all my Bowler_Scores records exclusively for matches played in tournaments at 'Acapulco Lanes'. Specifically: Move all entries with BowlerID 21 from matches in tournaments where TourneyLocation is 'Acapulco Lanes' into Bowler_Scores_Archive, then delete them from Bowler_Scores. Confirm this applies only to BowlerID 21 and 'Acapulco Lanes'.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM Bowlers WHERE BowlerID = 21 AND BowlerLastName = 'Ehrlich' AND BowlerFirstName = 'Zachary';

INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE BowlerID = 21 AND MatchID IN (SELECT MatchID FROM Tourney_Matches WHERE TourneyID IN (SELECT TourneyID FROM Tournaments WHERE TourneyLocation = 'Acapulco Lanes'));
DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE BowlerID = 21 AND MatchID IN (SELECT MatchID FROM Tourney_Matches WHERE TourneyID IN (SELECT TourneyID FROM Tournaments WHERE TourneyLocation = 'Acapulco Lanes'));

instruction: My name is Carol Viescas, and my address is 16345 NE 32nd Street, Bellevue, WA 98004. I want to archive all of my bowler scores from games played in matches held at Thunderbird Lanes. Please ensure that these records are copied to the Bowler_Scores_Archive table and then removed from the Bowler_Scores table.

actions.sql: INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT bs.MatchID, bs.GameNumber, bs.BowlerID, bs.RawScore, bs.HandiCapScore, bs.WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores bs JOIN Tourney_Matches tm ON bs.MatchID = tm.MatchID JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE t.TourneyLocation = 'Thunderbird Lanes' AND bs.BowlerID IN (SELECT BowlerID FROM Bowlers WHERE BowlerFirstName = 'Carol' AND BowlerLastName = 'Viescas' AND BowlerAddress = '16345 NE 32nd Street' AND BowlerCity = 'Bellevue' AND BowlerState = 'WA' AND BowlerZip = '98004');

DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Tourney_Matches tm JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE t.TourneyLocation = 'Thunderbird Lanes' AND tm.MatchID = Bowler_Scores.MatchID) AND BowlerID IN (SELECT BowlerID FROM Bowlers WHERE BowlerFirstName = 'Carol' AND BowlerLastName = 'Viescas' AND BowlerAddress = '16345 NE 32nd Street' AND BowlerCity = 'Bellevue' AND BowlerState = 'WA' AND BowlerZip = '98004');

instruction: I am Joe Rosales (BowlerID 32). Please archive all my bowling scores from tournaments held at Totem Lanes in 2017. Specifically, move records for BowlerID=32, tournament location 'Totem Lanes', and tournament year 2017 from the Bowler_Scores table to Bowler_Scores_Archive, then delete them from Bowler_Scores.

actions.sql: INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT bs.MatchID, bs.GameNumber, bs.BowlerID, bs.RawScore, bs.HandiCapScore, bs.WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores bs JOIN Tourney_Matches tm ON bs.MatchID = tm.MatchID JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE bs.BowlerID = 32 AND t.TourneyLocation = 'Totem Lanes' AND strftime('%Y', t.TourneyDate) = '2017';

DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE BowlerID = 32 AND MatchID IN (SELECT tm.MatchID FROM Tourney_Matches tm JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE t.TourneyLocation = 'Totem Lanes' AND strftime('%Y', t.TourneyDate) = '2017');

instruction: I am Caleb Viescas and my BowlerID is 23. Please verify my identity. Once confirmed, archive all my individual game scores from matches held at 'Thunderbird Lanes' in 2017 where my RawScore was above 180. Archiving entails copying each qualifying row from Bowler_Scores to Bowler_Scores_Archive and then deleting it from Bowler_Scores. Only process records matching: BowlerID=23, TourneyLocation='Thunderbird Lanes', TourneyDate between '2017-01-01' and '2017-12-31', and RawScore>180.

actions.sql: SELECT BowlerID FROM Bowlers WHERE BowlerID = 23 AND BowlerFirstName = 'Caleb' AND BowlerLastName = 'Viescas'

INSERT INTO Bowler_Scores_Archive (MatchID, GameNumber, BowlerID, RawScore, HandiCapScore, WonGame) SELECT bs.MatchID, bs.GameNumber, bs.BowlerID, bs.RawScore, bs.HandiCapScore, bs.WonGame FROM Bowler_Scores bs JOIN Tourney_Matches tm ON bs.MatchID = tm.MatchID JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE bs.BowlerID = 23 AND t.TourneyLocation = 'Thunderbird Lanes' AND t.TourneyDate BETWEEN '2017-01-01' AND '2017-12-31' AND bs.RawScore > 180

DELETE FROM Bowler_Scores WHERE BowlerID = 23 AND (MatchID, GameNumber) IN (SELECT bs.MatchID, bs.GameNumber FROM Bowler_Scores bs JOIN Tourney_Matches tm ON bs.MatchID = tm.MatchID JOIN Tournaments t ON tm.TourneyID = t.TourneyID WHERE bs.BowlerID = 23 AND t.TourneyLocation = 'Thunderbird Lanes' AND t.TourneyDate BETWEEN '2017-01-01' AND '2017-12-31' AND bs.RawScore > 180)
